featuredProjects.name: Bookish
featuredProjects.description: A cross-platform Flutter application for book lovers, powered by ebooks in public domain. Users can download, read, review and comment on ebooks under public domain.

featuredProjects.name: Mood Board
featuredProjects.description: Devil lies in details. Mood Board is a chrome extension that is built on to manage searchable multimedia content on web centring around a topic of your choice.

featuredProjects.name: NFT Unboxed
featuredProjects.description: Built an NFT Marketplace where users can create, sell and buy ERC721 compatible NFTs on Ethereum chain without platform fees.

featuredProjects.name: PenCast
featuredProjects.description: PenCast is an android appplication to bring version control to authors on the go. It helps authors write, shape and share their ideas with each other.

otherProjects.name: Web-to-pdf
otherProjects.description: Web app to convert html from any cross domain site to readable content (by Mozilla Readability) and then to PDF

otherProjects.name: Next-X-Feed
otherProjects.description: A blogging site with rich text-editor support, tagging system and recommendations for perfect reads.

otherProjects.name: Smart Lottery App
otherProjects.description: A web app for decentralized, trustless lottery system powered by Chainlink Oracles. Every lottery is certainly random.

otherProjects.name: Momentum
otherProjects.description: A mobile app to effective management of time and work through intelligent project completion and speed statistics to better gauge our momentum and be more productive

otherProjects.name: Task Tribe
otherProjects.description: A desktop to-do list with tribal vibes. Best part is the ability to track project status with multiple values.

otherProjects.name: Complaint Identification using Federated Learning
otherProjects.description: A transformer-XL based XLNet model trained on twitter dataset to identify complaints and achieved better performance with Federated Learning algorithms to ensure data security
